entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
